actions.summary: Allows users to trigger process via UI elements.

bulk-selection.summary: Allows users to select or deselect multiple items in a content view.

card-view.summary: Assembles a grid of cards in a gallery.

dashboard.summary: Provides an overview of key metrics or performance indicators.

filters.summary: Allows users to narrow down content from data.

primary-detail.summary: Shows users a list of items and corresponding details for a selected item.

right-to-left.summary: Demonstrates how the UI adapts to the writing mode of the page.

status-and-severity.summary: Rules and guidelines for communicating status and severity in a UI.
